title: Ticket #3646: Condor_ping Test
description:
Basic Test of condor_ping

cmd_condor_ping_basic.run

This test does a condor_ping -table ALL which queries the schedd in the personal hkcondor that it is running with. The test looks to scan 12 different lines that are expected in the table. It expects 12 lines to be found. Obviously if the defaults output from the test is changed this test will start failing.
check_ins: 2013-May-21 13:41   Check-in [35805]: Very basic condor_ping regression test #3646 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
